casebody.data:
Irene Smith CLIETT and Lucy Mayberry, Appellants, v. Mamie Scott HAMMONDS et al., Appellees. No. 17476. United States Court oí Appeals Fifth Circuit. May 5, 1959. Rehearing Denied June 29,1959. Sam R. Fisher, Houston, Tex., for appellants. W. H. Betts, Hempstead, Tex., George L. McGhee, Houston, Tex., for appel-lees.

Before HUTCHESON, Chief Judge, and TUTTLE and BROWN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed. Scott v. Smith, 5 Cir., 84 F.2d 489; Cliett v. Scott, 5 Cir., 102 F.2d 725; and Cliett v. Scott, 5 Cir., 233 F.2d 269.
